name: Maria Santos
title: ICU Nurse
quote: Unifhorce helped me navigate the complex NCLEX process and connected me with my dream job at a prestigious hospital in California. Their support made all the difference in my journey.

name: Jose Reyes
title: Charge Nurse
quote: The mentorship program connected me with a senior Filipino nurse who guided me through my first year in the US. Now I'm a charge nurse and mentoring others through Unifhorce.

name: Anna Cruz
title: Pediatric Nurse
quote: Beyond professional support, Unifhorce helped my entire family integrate into American life. My children are thriving in school, and we've found our community here.

name: Carlos Mendoza
title: Emergency Room Nurse
quote: The immigration support was invaluable. Unifhorce connected me with legal experts who helped streamline my visa process. Now I'm working at one of the world's top hospitals.

name: Linda Bautista
title: Surgical Nurse
quote: From credential evaluation to job placement, Unifhorce was with me every step. The cultural orientation helped me adapt quickly to the American healthcare system.

name: Roberto Garcia
title: Critical Care Nurse
quote: The continuing education programs helped me specialize in critical care. Unifhorce not only found me a job but helped me build a career I'm passionate about.
